title: How to Crochet a V Stitch Scarf

steps.headline: Sc in the first chain, * skip one chain, (dc, chain 2, dc to make a v-stitch) in the next chain, skip one chain, sc in the next chain.
steps.description: Repeat from * three times. Turn. Four v-stitches will have been made.

steps.headline: Chain 3, sc in the center of the first v-stitch, * (dc, chain 2, dc to make a v-stitch) in the next sc, sc in the center of the next v-stitch.
steps.description: Repeat from * twice. Dc in the last sc. Turn. Three v-stitches will have been made between the four v-stitches of the previous row.

steps.headline: Sc in the first dc, (dc, chain 2, dc to make a v-stitch) in the next sc, * sc in the center of the next v-stitch, (dc, chain 2, dc to make a v-stitch) in the next sc.
steps.description: Repeat from * twice. Sc in the top of the chain-3 of the previous row. Turn. Four v-stitches will have been made between the three v-stitches of the previous row.

steps.headline: Repeat Step 3 followed by Step 4 until desired length.

text: Chain 18-20 stitches. Turn. Sc in the first chain, * skip one chain, (dc, chain 2, dc to make a v-stitch) in the next chain, skip one chain, sc in the next chain. Repeat from * three times. Turn. Four v-stitches will have been made. Chain 3, sc in the center of the first v-stitch, * (dc, chain 2, dc to make a v-stitch) in the next sc, sc in the center of the next v-stitch. Repeat from * twice. Dc in the last sc. Turn. Three v-stitches will have been made between the four v-stitches of the previous row. Sc in the first dc, (dc, chain 2, dc to make a v-stitch) in the next sc, * sc in the center of the next v-stitch, (dc, chain 2, dc to make a v-stitch) in the next sc. Repeat from * twice. Sc in the top of the chain-3 of the previous row. Turn. Four v-stitches will have been made between the three v-stitches of the previous row. Repeat Step 3 followed by Step 4 until desired length.  Fasten off.  Finished.
